summary: I really hope the EPIX poster spoiler going around is just a rough draft. The knights of ren on it are cool and the lack of a...
body: I really hope the EPIX poster spoiler going around is just a rough draft. The knights of ren on it are cool and the lack of a legacy character centralizing it all is forward thinking but no Rose anywhere? Whaaaa?

summary: Star Wars játék az áprilisi Gold kínálatban!
title: Star Wars játék az áprilisi Gold kínálatban!
body:
A Microsoft viszonylag korán lelőtte, mivel is fogja elkényeztetni az Xbox Live előfizetőket a jövő hónapban. Most sem maradnak ki a jó játékok, igaz a retro felé vesszük az irányt áprilisban.

A Microsoft viszonylag korán lelőtte, mivel is fogja elkényeztetni az Xbox Live előfizetőket a jövő hónapban. Most sem maradnak ki a jó játékok, igaz a retro felé vesszük az irányt áprilisban.

A retro közül kitűnik a Technomancer, amely már az új generációs konzolokra készült, így ízig-vérig egy next-gen játék az alacsony költségvetése ellenére is. Nem egy világmegvaltó alkotás, semmilyen…

View On WordPress

blog.name: geekynerfherder
blog.title: Geeky Nerfherder
blog.description: UK based. Connoisseur of pop culture. Enthusiast of good things. Lover of Sci-fi & Fantasy. Devotee of contemporary, fantastical, comic & vintage art. Posting all that and more that grabs my interest.

summary: 'I Did Miss You' by Joshua Budich. 18" x 24" 4 colour screen print on premium French Madero Beach stock paper, in a signed and...
caption:
‘I Did Miss You’ by Joshua Budich.

18" x 24" 4 colour screen print on premium French Madero Beach stock paper, in a signed and numbered limited edition of 200 for $40.

On sale Thursday March 28 around 12pm ET from his website.

Follow him on Twitter and Instagram for the on sale announcement.

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

blog.name: swpromptsandasks
blog.title: StarWars prompts and asks
blog.description: Send me your best (weird, nsfw and cute) prompts and asks for Star wars and if they contain Obi-Wan then hurray for me. Lets see what we can drum up. (I don't write for the last trilogy, apologies)

summary: So Grooming and Ears, I feel like one of the bigger cats is going to pick up Obi while they are running as he is having...
question: So Grooming and Ears, I feel like one of the bigger cats is going to pick up Obi while they are running as he is having difficulty keeping up in a retreat.  I so want to read that, especially if Obi is scruffed.
answer:
Hissing loudly at the droids, Obi-Wan swatted at the one who had tried to kick him, satisfaction curdling in his belly as the metal fell apart before yelping as there was a sudden jolt and he was swept off his feet, hissing even louder in displeasure as Mace had bitten down on his neck and was currently racing away with his fellow feline.

Anakin lined up with them a moment later with the long legged clone Mando’a shepards following them, the tattoine abyssian throwing him an incredulous look. “We were to retreat Obi-Wan, honestly!” The long legged bastard yelped out as if he hadn’t changed plans before the hypocrite.

Obi-Wan just hissed at him, murring unhappily as he heard amused wuffles from the canines surrounding them in formation as the Jedi’s raced towards safer ground, through a canyon to create a choke hold point to thin out the ranks of the droids by forcing them to go through the choke hold and therefor put themselves in danger.

Finally however Obi-Wan was dropped on the grass but before he could straighten himself up, Mace placed a paw on his spine and kept him down like some kind of misbehaving kitten and that picture was emphasized when the black korun oriental short hair nipped forcibly at Obi-Wan’s ear in reprimand when the munchkin tried to straighten.

“Mace!” Obi-Wan cried out.

“Stay down.” Mace rumbled unhappily back at him, his tail lashing unhappily but so was Obi-Wan’s as he tried to roll around to paw at the older man.

Anakin watched it with some fascination, having never been around for one of Mace and Obi-Wan’s arguments.

“For Force sake Obi-Wan, let the troopers take them off at the choke point and don’t put yourself in danger, there was a reason we called retreat.” Mace snapped back and this time outright went for a throat bite, murring unhappily into the white fur until Obi-Wan whined and went limp.

Huffing in satisfaction, the black cat straightened and turned his eyes back on the battle, his whole body tense and waiting to see if he needed to spring back into action to aid.

Which was rather unfair if Obi-Wan could point it out, considering Mace just went for the throat to ensure Obi-Wan stayed out of the way.

“Least you weren’t almost turned into a pastry again?” Anakin grinned down at him and Obi-Wan shot him a filthy glare before straightening up when he registered that he was no longer being held down, Mace likely deciding that Obi-Wan’s submission was genuine.

Of course, it was… for now.

That did not mean he had to like it and when Cody finally returned to Obi-Wan’s side, the long legged Mando’a shepard leaning down to gently nuzzle him and inform him that all the droids were taken care of with stragglers fleeing, Obi-Wan unleashed his unhappiness on the korun.

By outright pouncing on him in a hissy fit and giving him hell.

Mace let out a swear so loud and violent it drew all the canines to them and soon enough there was a round of barking as the clones tried to figure out how to separate the two fighting cats though a few of them seemed impressed by how vicious Obi-Wan really was.

So he was small, he was scrappy but he fought like a demon and by the time Mace finally surrendered, both were supporting nose and ear scratches but Obi-Wan also wore said scratches like badges of honor.

Cause no one made him sit out on a battle as if he was some kitten without Obi-Wan making his unhappiness apparent.

“…I am totally telling Master Qui-Gon.” Anakin grinned at him before yelping loudly and running for it as Obi-Wan instantly streaked after him, hissing up a storm until Cody outright wrapped his mouth around Obi-Wan’s midsection and lifted the munchkin straight up, heading for the transports with his now sulking General and the long suffering Jedi knight who acted as their pilot just stared at them.

Anakin watched it with some fascination, having never been around for one of Mace and Obi-Wan’s arguments.

“For Force sake Obi-Wan, let the troopers take them off at the choke point and don’t put yourself in danger, there was a reason we called retreat.” Mace snapped back and this time outright went for a throat bite, murring unhappily into the white fur until Obi-Wan whined and went limp.

Huffing in satisfaction, the black cat straightened and turned his eyes back on the battle, his whole body tense and waiting to see if he needed to spring back into action to aid.

Which was rather unfair if Obi-Wan could point it out, considering Mace just went for the throat to ensure Obi-Wan stayed out of the way.

“Least you weren’t almost turned into a pastry again?” Anakin grinned down at him and Obi-Wan shot him a filthy glare before straightening up when he registered that he was no longer being held down, Mace likely deciding that Obi-Wan’s submission was genuine.

Of course, it was… for now.

That did not mean he had to like it and when Cody finally returned to Obi-Wan’s side, the long legged Mando’a shepard leaning down to gently nuzzle him and inform him that all the droids were taken care of with stragglers fleeing, Obi-Wan unleashed his unhappiness on the korun.

By outright pouncing on him in a hissy fit and giving him hell.

Mace let out a swear so loud and violent it drew all the canines to them and soon enough there was a round of barking as the clones tried to figure out how to separate the two fighting cats though a few of them seemed impressed by how vicious Obi-Wan really was.

So he was small, he was scrappy but he fought like a demon and by the time Mace finally surrendered, both were supporting nose and ear scratches but Obi-Wan also wore said scratches like badges of honor.

Cause no one made him sit out on a battle as if he was some kitten without Obi-Wan making his unhappiness apparent.

“…I am totally telling Master Qui-Gon.” Anakin grinned at him before yelping loudly and running for it as Obi-Wan instantly streaked after him, hissing up a storm until Cody outright wrapped his mouth around Obi-Wan’s midsection and lifted the munchkin straight up, heading for the transports with his now sulking General and the long suffering Jedi knight who acted as their pilot just stared at them.
trail.content:
Hissing loudly at the droids, Obi-Wan swatted at the one who had tried to kick him, satisfaction curdling in his belly as the metal fell apart before yelping as there was a sudden jolt and he was swept off his feet, hissing even louder in displeasure as Mace had bitten down on his neck and was currently racing away with his fellow feline.

Anakin lined up with them a moment later with the long legged clone Mando’a shepards following them, the tattoine abyssian throwing him an incredulous look. “We were to retreat Obi-Wan, honestly!” The long legged bastard yelped out as if he hadn’t changed plans before the hypocrite.

Obi-Wan just hissed at him, murring unhappily as he heard amused wuffles from the canines surrounding them in formation as the Jedi’s raced towards safer ground, through a canyon to create a choke hold point to thin out the ranks of the droids by forcing them to go through the choke hold and therefor put themselves in danger.

Finally however Obi-Wan was dropped on the grass but before he could straighten himself up, Mace placed a paw on his spine and kept him down like some kind of misbehaving kitten and that picture was emphasized when the black korun oriental short hair nipped forcibly at Obi-Wan’s ear in reprimand when the munchkin tried to straighten.

“Mace!” Obi-Wan cried out.

“Stay down.” Mace rumbled unhappily back at him, his tail lashing unhappily but so was Obi-Wan’s as he tried to roll around to paw at the older man.

Anakin watched it with some fascination, having never been around for one of Mace and Obi-Wan’s arguments.

“For Force sake Obi-Wan, let the troopers take them off at the choke point and don’t put yourself in danger, there was a reason we called retreat.” Mace snapped back and this time outright went for a throat bite, murring unhappily into the white fur until Obi-Wan whined and went limp.

Huffing in satisfaction, the black cat straightened and turned his eyes back on the battle, his whole body tense and waiting to see if he needed to spring back into action to aid.

Which was rather unfair if Obi-Wan could point it out, considering Mace just went for the throat to ensure Obi-Wan stayed out of the way.

“Least you weren’t almost turned into a pastry again?” Anakin grinned down at him and Obi-Wan shot him a filthy glare before straightening up when he registered that he was no longer being held down, Mace likely deciding that Obi-Wan’s submission was genuine.

Of course, it was… for now.

That did not mean he had to like it and when Cody finally returned to Obi-Wan’s side, the long legged Mando’a shepard leaning down to gently nuzzle him and inform him that all the droids were taken care of with stragglers fleeing, Obi-Wan unleashed his unhappiness on the korun.

By outright pouncing on him in a hissy fit and giving him hell.

Mace let out a swear so loud and violent it drew all the canines to them and soon enough there was a round of barking as the clones tried to figure out how to separate the two fighting cats though a few of them seemed impressed by how vicious Obi-Wan really was.

So he was small, he was scrappy but he fought like a demon and by the time Mace finally surrendered, both were supporting nose and ear scratches but Obi-Wan also wore said scratches like badges of honor.

Cause no one made him sit out on a battle as if he was some kitten without Obi-Wan making his unhappiness apparent.

“…I am totally telling Master Qui-Gon.” Anakin grinned at him before yelping loudly and running for it as Obi-Wan instantly streaked after him, hissing up a storm until Cody outright wrapped his mouth around Obi-Wan’s midsection and lifted the munchkin straight up, heading for the transports with his now sulking General and the long suffering Jedi knight who acted as their pilot just stared at them.

blog.name: swpromptsandasks
blog.title: StarWars prompts and asks
blog.description: Send me your best (weird, nsfw and cute) prompts and asks for Star wars and if they contain Obi-Wan then hurray for me. Lets see what we can drum up. (I don't write for the last trilogy, apologies)

summary: Could we maybe please have a continuation of the next part of only one since it left off with the message to the Jedi of the...
question: Could we maybe please have a continuation of the next part of only one since it left off with the message to the Jedi of the lockdown of the government and all those happenings?
answer:
Blinking heavily, his bitten bonding gland obvious and swollen to all around him, Obi-Wan tucked his thumbs into his belt. “What do you mean Yoda is dead?” He rasped out as Cody lingered in his omega’s space, a hand resting on his hip for support.

“I…that’s what the message said.” Anakin mumbled out, still clearly coping with the news.

Looking at his mate, Obi-Wan blinked slowly before looking at Luminara.

She shrugged, crossing her arms worriedly over her chest. “That is what the recording said, it also included that Coruscant and the Senate are on lock down and we are to remain where we are. And that Palpatine was the very Sith we were searching for.” She pursed her lips at that.

Anakin meanwhile outright flinched, rubbing his face with his hands as Ahsoka leaned closer into her distressed master in an attempt to help him calm down.

Letting out a low noise as he shifted his sore body, Obi-Wan crawled into the other man’s lap and wrapped his arms around Anakin’s shoulders.

Instantly the alpha wrapped his arms around him in return, locking in on his pack mate and brother while taking deep lungfuls of air, ignoring the scent of mated omega and focusing on the scent of Obi-Wan, safe and warm in his arms.

Clearly the attachment of his pack brother in his arms was aiding the other and Obi-Wan gently ran his fingers through Anakin’s hair while looking at the others. “So what do we do? Do we wait here or do we pack up and start the return to Coruscant?” He questioned.

“It is in loc-”

Breaking into the sentence before it could be finished, Obi-Wan smiled. “Yes, I know that. But we can still linger in the airspace outside the planet and wait until we get contact. We are not needed here right now and we were to be summoned back regardless once the situation with the troopers being forced to attack was cleared.” Obi-Wan pointed out while scratching at Anakin’s scalp.

The alpha was purring quietly into Obi-Wan’s collarbone.

Frowning a bit, Luminara rubbed her chin. “True, we should return and at the very least wait for further instructions,” She settled on before nodding and gesturing for Ahsoka to follow her. “Come with me padawan, lets get an overview and aid with the leaving.” She stated, leaving no option for the togruta but to follow.

Rex and Cody exchanged looks too before the former followed after the two female Jedi, leaving the three alone.

Settling down on one of the remaining chairs, Cody sighed a bit. “This is all a mess isn’t it?” He murmured, watching his mate and General comfort his pack brother.

“Very much so, but we’ll fix it.” Obi-Wan smiled wryly at his mate.

“I am so angry.” Anakin whispered, prompting Obi-Wan to instantly return his attention to his pack brother, scratching his fingernails through the dirty blond hair.

“Palpatine?” He murmured, sighing quietly when Anakin nodded into his collarbone. “I know, its horrendous and I can’t imagine the betrayal you are feeling Anakin but I promise you, I’m still here, I’ll always be your pack brother Ani.” Obi-Wan murmured quietly, shifting gingerly to press against the other as much as he could and purring softly at the alpha.

Cody just quietly observed the effect his mate had on his pack brother, smiling a bit.

Skywalker wasn’t the calmest of people but the pheromones Obi-Wan brought and the pack bonding they engaged in clearly aided the man even right after the heat where Obi-Wan had chosen to share with an alpha for once.

Maybe that was some of it too, the concept of Obi-Wan being safe and cared for by an alpha having a soothing effect on the hind alpha brain?

Cody didn’t know but he knew that they needed to pack up and get off the planet if they wanted to travel to Coruscant and wait for the lock down to disengage.
